attributes.additional_details:
Murderers, child abusers, cruelty to animals, rapists..
People like these are living in our world waiting to strike and there no longer afraid of the law we need to scare serious criminals into not spreading pain life should be a happy safe place for everyone but it isnt the innocent live in fear and the guilty laugh in the faces of the law because its just not tough enough.

Sign this and make a change to the world.
